    1: <?php
    2:
    3: namespace Symbiotatk\Symbtk\Data\Model\Filterparser;
    4:
    5: /** Generate SQL filter components (ie. WHERE, <SELECT FIELDS>, LIMIT)
    6: * @param Array $attributes
    7: * @return Object $filter { WHERE, SELECT_FIELDS }
    8: */
    9: function SQL (Array $attr) {
    10: $env = (object) [
    11: 'delim' => ':',
    12: 'sep' => ',',
    13: 'div' => ';',
    14: 'label' => 'filter',
    15: 'term' => 'WHERE',
    16: 'attribute' => 't.attribute',
    17: 'value' => 't.value',
    18: 'fattribute' => 'f.attribute',
    19: 'status' => 'u.status'
    20: ];
    21:
    22: $str = '';
    23: $filters = [];
    24: $fields = [];
    25:
    26: $hasStatus = function (Array $attr) use ($env) {
    27: $value = 0;
    28: $label = 'status';
    29:
    30: if (isset($attr[$label]) && (! is_null($attr[$label]))) {
    31: $value = $attr[$label];
    32: };
    33:
    34: return "$env->status = ${value}";
    35: };
    36:
    37: $hasMultiple = function (String $str) {
    38: $delim = ',';
    39: if(strpos($str, $delim) === false) { return false; }
    40:
    41: return explode($delim, $str);
    42: };
    43:
    44: $hasCompare = function (String $pattern, String $compare) {
    45: $operators = [
    46: 'match' => '=',
    47: 'contain' => 'LIKE',
    48: 'null' => 'IS NULL',
    49: 'notnull' => 'IS NOT NULL',
    50: 'start' => 'LIKE',
    51: 'end' => 'LIKE',
    52: 'equal' => '=',
    53: 'greater' => '>',
    54: 'less' => '>'
    55: ];
    56: $numbers = ['equal', 'greater', 'less'];
    57: if ($compare === 'contain') {
    58: $pattern = '%'.$pattern.'%';
    59: }
    60: elseif ($compare === 'start') {
    61: $pattern = $pattern.'%';
    62: }
    63: elseif ($compare === 'end') {
    64: $pattern = '%'.$pattern;
    65: }
    66:
    67: return (object) [
    68: 'pattern' => (in_array($compare, $numbers)) ? $pattern : "'$pattern'",
    69: 'compare' => (isset($operators[$compare])) ? $operators[$compare] : $operators['equal']
    70: ];
    71: };
    72:
    73: // ?andor
    74: $hasAndOr = function (String $andor, String $compare) {
    75: };
    76:
    77: $hasPattern = function (String $str) use ($env, $hasCompare) {
    78: $parts = explode($env->div, $str);
    79: $attribute = (isset($parts[0])) ? $parts[0] : false;
    80: $pattern = (isset($parts[1])) ? $parts[1] : false;
    81: $compare = (isset($parts[2])) ? $parts[2] : 'match';
    82: $andor = (isset($parts[3])) ? ' '.$parts[3] : ' and';
    83: $associated = (isset($parts[4])) ? $parts[4] : false;
    84:
    85: $pattern = $hasCompare($pattern, $compare)->pattern;
    86: $compare = $hasCompare($pattern, $compare)->compare;
    87:
    88: return (($attribute) && ($pattern)) ? "( $env->attribute = '$attribute' AND $env->value $compare $pattern ) $andor" : false;
    89: };
    90:
    91: $hasPatterns = function (String $str) use ($hasMultiple, $hasPattern) {
    92: $patterns = ($hasMultiple($str)) ? $hasMultiple($str) : [$str];
    93: $patterns = array_map($hasPattern, $patterns);
    94: $patterns = preg_replace(['/ and$/','/ or$/'], ['',''], implode(" ", $patterns));
    95: return $patterns;
    96: };
    97:
    98: $hasComponents = function (String $str) use ($env, $hasMultiple, $hasPatterns) {
    99: if(strpos($str, $env->delim) === false) { return false; }
    100: $parts = explode($env->delim, $str);
    101:
    102: $attributes = (isset($parts[1])) ? $parts[1] : false;
    103: $attributes = ($attributes !== '*') ? $attributes : false;
    104:
    105: $patterns = (isset($parts[2])) ? $parts[2] : false;
    106:
    107: return (object) [
    108: 'attributes' => ($hasMultiple($attributes)) ? $hasMultiple($attributes) : [ $attributes ],
    109: 'patterns' => $hasPatterns($patterns)
    110: ];
    111: };
    112:
    113: $isEmpty = function (String $str) {
    114: return (trim($str) === '') ? true : false;
    115: };
    116:
    117: $status = $hasStatus($attr);
    118: if ($status) {
    119: array_push($filters, $status);
    120: }
    121:
    122: if (isset($attr[$env->label]) && (! is_null($attr[$env->label]))) {
    123: $t1 = $hasComponents($attr[$env->label]);
    124: if ($t1) {
    125: $filters = array_merge($filters, [$t1->patterns]);
    126: $fields = array_merge($fields, $t1->attributes);
    127: }
    128: };
    129:
    130: if (sizeof($filters) > 0) {
    131: $sp = ((sizeof($filters) > 1) && (trim($filters[1]) !== '')) ? ' and ' : ' ';
    132:
    133: $filter_str = implode($sp, $filters);
    134: $str = $env->term." $filter_str";
    135: };
    136:
    137: return (object) [
    138: 'where' => $str,
    139: 'select_fields' => ((sizeof($fields) > 0) && (isset($fields[0])) && (trim($fields[0]) !== '')) ? "$env->fattribute IN ('".implode("', '",$fields)."')" : null
    140: ];
    141: }
    142:
